item.title: Theme Documentation - mermaid Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The mermaid shortcode supports diagrams in Hugo with Mermaid library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - echarts Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The echarts shortcode supports data visualization in Hugo with ECharts library. ECharts is a library helping you to generate interactive data visualization. The basic chart types ECharts supports include line series, bar series, scatter series, pie charts, candle-stick series, boxplot series for statistics, map series, heatmap series, lines series for directional information, graph series for relationships, treemap series, sunburst series, parallel series for multi-dimensional data, funnel series, gauge series. And it’s extremely easy to create a combinition of them with ECharts.

item.title: Theme Documentation - mapbox Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The mapbox shortcode supports interactive maps in Hugo with Mapbox GL JS library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - music Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The music shortcode embeds a responsive music player based on APlayer and MetingJS.

item.title: Theme Documentation - bilibili Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The bilibili shortcode embeds a responsive video player for bilibili videos.

item.title: Theme Documentation - typeit Shortcode
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: The typeit shortcode provides typing animation based on TypeIt library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Basics
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Discover what the Hugo - LoveIt theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Extended Shortcodes
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: LoveIt theme provides multiple shortcodes on top of built-in ones in Hugo. 1 style Note Hugo extended version is necessary for style shortcode. style is a shortcode to insert custom style in your post. The style shortcode has two positional parameters. The first one is the custom style content, which supports nesting syntax in :(fab fa-sass fa-fw): SASS and & referring to this parent HTML element. And the second one is the tag name of the HTML element wrapping the content you want to change style, and whose default value is div.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Content
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Find out how to create and organize your content quickly and intuitively in LoveIt theme.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description:
• 1 Headings
  • 2 Comments
  • 3 Horizontal Rules
  • 4 Body Copy
  • 5 Inline HTML
  • 6 Emphasis
    • Bold
    • Italics
    • Strikethrough
    • Combination
  • 7 Blockquotes
  • 8 Lists
    • Unordered
    • Ordered
    • Task Lists
  • 9 Code
    • Inline Code
    • Indented Code
    • Block Fenced Code
    • Syntax Highlighting
  • 10 Tables
  • 11 Links {#links}
    • Basic Link
    • Add a Title
    • Named Anchors
  • 12 Footnotes
  • 13 Images

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.
